description:
Made from the ever-popular Ferrosi fabric, designed for fluid movements and stretchy pursuits. The wide waistband sits high across your hips, and flat-lock stitching feels smooth and reduces chafing.

  • DuraPrint™ technology adds extra durability and Vantage fabric for greater comfort and ease of movement
  • High-rise 7/8 leggings with 4-way stretch moves with you
  • Wide contoured mesh-lined waistband provides extra coverage
  • Drop-In thigh pockets and a secure waistband pocket for small valuables
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees give you room to move
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Hybrid Leggings - Women's
